title: [Painting of 'toothworm']
description: A single folio taken from a copy of Sharḥ al-Qaṣīdah al-Munfarijah lil-Tawzarī on which a painting of a ‘toothworm’ has been over-painted. Underlying text: 18th century CE(?). Over-painting: 20th century CE(?).
record_origin: Description based in part on Emilie Savage-Smith, A New Catalogue of Arabic Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, Vol. 1: Medicine. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2011, p. 794-796, Entry 242.
